div.p:
Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem primo die mensis
Julij Anno quo supra

The said' day Comperit WIlliam boll mastir of ane Schip vndir gode callit Johne
and present the compt betuix him and michaele baudevy of the Resat of ale Somes
and deliuerance of the samyn Sene the first entires' of the said' michel with his part of the
said' Schip quhilk compt he deponit be his aithe was leile and trewe in ale
thingis Ande the said' compt in writ he deliuerit to gilbert menyes prouest Ande
maid' constitut and ordanit the said' gilbert his lauchfule and vndoutit procurator actor
factor and Speciale deput gevand' crantand' and committand to the said' gilbert and his
substitutis ane or may his fule and plane pouer' tile ask and resaue ale frauchtis
and gudis aucht to him be the saide michell and ale vthiris and of his resatis aqui
tance to gif And' gif neid' be the said michell and ale vthiris to follow and persew
And' to lat his half of the said' schip to fraucht and tile ger' arrest the tothir half
of the said Schipe pertening to the said' michell And' forthir ale vthir and Sindrie
thingis to do excerce and vys' in the premiss' that he micht do and he war' present promit
tand him to hald ferme and Stabile ale and quhatsumeuere thingis his saide procurator
his substitutis ane or may ledis to be done with ale vthir claus' necessar and oportoun'
befor thir witnes Johne leslie of warderis mastir Dauid menyes thomas Waus ser Dauy
Waus Richerd Waus Norman leslie Richerd Redhed' And tharapone the saide William
askit Instrument of me sere Johane Sterueling notar publicis and procurit the Sele of James
Colisone Johne mar' and Johne Retre balyeis Acta hora quasi decima ante meredien
to be affixt to the procuratorj to be maid' herapone

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem Septimo die mensis
Julij anno quo supra

The said' day Alexander hay was conuict be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie for
spekar for brekin of commone ordinance and the statutis of the toune in the bying
and Inbringyne of the woll within the toune fra ssuspect folkis and placis for the quhilkis
he was in ane Amerciament of the court and tile amend as law and forber' in tym'
to Cum and that was gevin for dome

The said' day Alexander hay was conuict' be the said assis' for tribulance of the
Court for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court et cetera and till amend' as
law will and forber in tyme tocum

The said day Alexander hay was in ane amerciament of the Court be the said assis'
thomas leslie for tribulance of sere Johne ruthirfurd' knicht and tile amend'
as law wile and forber' in tyme to Cum

The said day Alexander hay was conuict' be ane suorne assis' thomas
leslie forspekar for dissobeing of norman leslie officiar and Johne of Ratre
ane of the balyeis of the said burghe sitand in Jugment and in takin of his
dissobeing the said normond officiar brek his wand one hyme for the quhilk
he was in amerciament of the court et cetera and to amend as law wile and forbeir'
in tyme to cum
The said' day Alexander logy grauntit him aving to Thome Ridale ix s'

The said' day Comperit Inglisman with patry leslie his forspekar and schew
how the Couparis of the burghe' hed' tane one thame to furnis' ale personis
havand' salmond' of barrellis for the expens' tharfor he protestit gif he
happinnis to want ony barrellis In thar' defalt for his money to pak his
mastir fysche that he may provid' thame in vthir placis

head.add: Souerte to John moir' for the ayris of Alexander Sanquhar'

div.p:
The saide day Johne of Kintor Jonet Sanquhar' and Eduard Wat hir spous'
Come Souerte be thar handis vphaldin to Johne moir' to freitht releiwe
and keip the land' of Williame moir' liand' in the skulhile and the said' William
and his ayris skathtles of ale annuell Rentis

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem septimo die
mensis Julij Anno quo supra

The said day day margret caidiowe was conuict' be ane suorne' assis' thomas
lesly forspekar for the tribulance of Anne Iruyne for the quhilks scho was
in ane amerciament of the court and' to amend as law will and' forbear
in tyme to cum

The said day canne fechat was conuict' be the said assis' thomas leslie
forspekar for tribulance of anne Iruyne for the quhilkis scho was in
ane amerciament of the court And' to amend' as law will and' forbeir
in tyme to cum et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem decimo die mensis Julij
anno quo supra

The said' day It was diuisit and ordanit be the prouest ballieis and Counsale for the
offence done be Alexander hay to ser Johne ruthirfurd' knicht that the said' Alexander sal
gif half ane stane of wax to the hald blud licht and sale syt done one his kneis
and ask the said' knicht forgiwnes and pray the prouest and balyeis to mak Instance
to the said' knicht to forgiff him Ande gif euere the said' Alexander hay committis
ony offence to the said' knicht and beis conuict tharof in tyme or tile ony vthir sale pay to Sanct
nicholes werk tene pundis vnforgevin to the fulfilling of the quhilkis deliuerance the
said' Alexander was oblist be the fatht of his bodie

The said' day the balyeis assignit this day viij dais to the Relict of vmquhile Dauy
Crukschank to bring Jok Crukschank sone and ayr to vmquhile Johne Crukschank befor
the prouest and Counsale to resaue his airschipe and gif Sufficient acquitance and Caucion'
tharfor according to Justice

The said' day the prouest ballieis and Counsale grauntit and assignit fourtj schillingis to be
tane of ane freman or forstallaris to ser Dauy Rounseman Sangstar to by him ane
govne for his gude seruice in the quer' et cetera done and to be done

The said day Alexander hay was conuict for tribulance of William cheishame be ane Suorne
assis'

The said day comperit William Walcar witht Johnne keitht in Dis' his forspekar
and exponit how that thar was offence done to him be Androw grig his wiff'
and' besse Waus quhilk was referit to certane personis giff thai culd'
agre thame and gif thai coud nocht to cum one monunday that nixt cummis
to vndirly the decisioun' of ane assis' but ony excepcioun' delatour'

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiij die Julij
anno quo supra

The said day the debat ande Contrauersie movit betuix Androu gray one
that ane part Ande Johne Andirsone one that vthir part with consent of batht
the saide partiis Is Continevit to the hayme Cumin of my lorde of Abirdene

Eodem die Alexander Rany fecit creauit et nominauit Duncanj portar suum legittimum et Indubitatem
procuratorem dans et concedens eidem suam legitimam presentatem ac mandatum speciale pro se et nomine suo
ad prosequendum thomam byris pro octo vnce et tribus quartariis pannj albi le carsay et
pro xij d' sibj debito Agendum respondendum defendendum Ceteram omnia et singula faciendum
In premisse promittens de Rato et grato in vberiore forma procuratorij Cum ceteris
clausulis necesseriis et oportunis

head.add: for the closing of the toune

div.p:
The said' day the haile Counsale ordanit the prouest and ane bailye with him tak
of the Ridiast of thar' girssomes quhar' thai may be best gottin and big ande
vpmak the portis of the toune ande clois' It quhar throw the toune may be
kepit fra the contageous' plage of pestlence And' atour thai ordanit the officiaris to
pas' throw the toune and warne euere man and euere hous' to send a seruand' with
Instrumentis conuenient to help to mak the said' portis and dikis Sufficient

The said day bessy Waus was conuict be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie forspekar
for tribulance of William Walcar' and his hous' for the quhilk scho was in ane Amerciament
of the court to Amend' as law wil and forber' in tym to cum

The said' day Williame Coupar tailyour was conuict be ane Suorne assis' ser Johne
ruthirfurd forspekar for tribulance of Androw steuartis and the said' Androw was conuict
for tribulance of the said' William for the quhilkis Ilkan of thame was in ane
amerciament of the court et cetera and tile amend' as law wile et cetera Nochtwithstanding the prouo
cacioun' of the said' tribulance was fundin in the said' William

The said day Alexander blinsele was in ane Amerciament of the court be his avne tounge
gravnt for tribulance of alexander Ramsay and to amend' as law wile and forbeir'
in tyme to Cum Ande the saide Alexander ramsay quyt of ale tribulance of the said'
Alexander blinsele And' Dauy blinsele Come Souerte be his hande landis and gudis
to Entir the said Alexander blinsele one friday that next cumis befor the prouest and
balyeis within the tolbutht thar to vndirlie the Counsale anent the making of
Amendis to the said' Alexander Ramsay

Eodem die Dauid blinsele deuenit plegius legalis per manus et bona quod Alexander Ramsay
erit Indempnis pro Alexandro blinsele aliter quam per viam Juris Et thomas leslie deuenit
plegius legalis quod dictus Alexander blinsele erit Indempnis pro dicto Alexandro Ramsay
aliter quam per viam Juris et dictos partes obligantur ad releuandum suos plegios
de huiusmodi fideiussione per manus et bona

Curia balliuorum Burgj de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
Decimo sexto die mensis Julij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day thomas leslie come caucionar be his hand landis and
gudis to Johnne crak and' Elene andersone his spous to dischargis
thame and' quietclame thame thair ayris executouris and' assignez
of ale gudis of ayrschip and vthir gudis quhatsumeuire pertenyng to
Jok crukschank sone and ayr to vmquhile Johnne crukschank alias
talyour his fadir for him his ayris executoris and assignez nove and
foreuire And' the sad Johnne crukschank oblist him be his hand'
landis and gudis to releif and freitht the said thomas of the said
caucioun'

The said day the bailyes chargit Anne futhes pinor to deliuer to Androw
Kennerty his govne as suffiient and' haill as scho Intrometit witht
within viij dais eftir that thomas Riddaile cumis hame'

The said day normond leslie grantit to pay to Alexander prat tua merkis
vsuale money of scotland' or thane to caus him be pait within terme
of lawe

head.add: the wif of Johne gib cuk seriand

div.p:
The said day the wif of Johnne' gib was conuict be ane suorne assis'
Johnne of cullan forspekar for the tribulance of Johne cuk officiar
ffor the quhilkis scho was in ane amerciament of the court and' to amend'
as law will and' forbeir in tyme to cum

The said day georgis saidlar grantit him awand to Johnne' Watsone
stablar thre schillingis and four pennis vsuale money of scotland'
quhilkis the bailyes chargit him to pay withtin terme' of lawe

Curia baliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxmo die
mensis Julij anno quo supra

The said day It was fundin and deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' thomas leslie
forspekar that Alexander prat sale decist and ces' fra ale Inquietacioun' of sere
Johne litster' anent the occupacioun' of ane taile of the yard' eftir the
tenor of the said sere Johnez chartir

The said day Alexander prat protestit Solempnit that quhat the assis' hed' done
anent the taile of the yerd' clamit be sere Johne litstar suld' turne him to nay
preiudice

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxiij die
mensis Julij anno quo supra

The said' day Johne craik oblist him be his hand' vphaldin to pay to Johne
crukschank alias talyour Sone and ayr tile vmquhile Johne Crukschank
and' to Elene laurence his grandame thretty fiwe schillingis scottis money
of the Rest of his barnispart of gudis to be pait at mertymes next
to cum

The said' day mastir Alexander bisset with Johne of Cullane his forspekar protestit
that he be nocht hurt in the possessioun' of his Inlande forthir thane the Act of
the court buk proportis

The said' day sere Johne ruthirfurd forspekar for Alexander talyour protestit that quhat
was done Anent the said' Act suld' turne his heretage to nay preiudice And'
atour the said' mastir Alexander bisset said Alexander talyour hed' nay possessioun' of the
Inland' Ande gif any hed' possessioun' of It It was megy buchane

The said' day Johne Cuk officiar entirit Johne Duthe befor the prouest and ballieis to
ansuer' to Johne of Cullane et cetera

The said' day the prouest and ballieis continevit the actioun' debatabile betuix Johne of Cullan'
one that ane part And' Johne Duthe one that vthir part anent the clame of vij bollis of malt
clamyt be the said Johne to this day viij dais but preiudice tile ony partj

The said' day Johne of murray was conuict be ane Suorne assis' Williame Wormet
forspekar for the wranguis ourbying of James Colison' of xv stane of wole fra Robert of gordon'
et cetera for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera

The said' day WIlliame loremare was conuict' be ane suorne assis' William Wormet forspekar
for tribulance of Robe Cultis seruand to Dauy Kintor et cetera for the quhilkis he was in ane
amerciament of the court and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tym' to cum

The said' day Johne blitht was conuict' be ane Suorne assis' Williame Wormet forspekar
for tribulance of Johne Andirson' for the quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the court
and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tym' to cum et cetera

Curia balliuorum burgj de Abirdene Tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvijo
die mensis Julij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said day it was statut and ordanit be the prouest and counsaill
that nay manere of persone nor personis lay nor hing nay manere of
stuff gair nor gudis one the wale of the plaice of the gray freris
befor the takin of the haly croice And quha happinis to do the contrar
the gudis salebe eschet And thai sale pay ane amerciament of the Court
to the bailyes vnforgevin for the first tyme And' the secund tume thai
salbe expellit the toune And' thar gudis eschet'

Eodem die Duncanus colisone deuenit plegius legalis per manus
sue dextre ostensionem quod Johannes Andirsone erit Indempnis pro Alexandro
gray aliter quam per viam Juris Et Willelmus Rolland deuenit plegius
legalis per manus sue dextre ostensionem quod dictus Alexander gray erit
Indempnes pro dicto Johanne aliter quam per viam Juris Willelmus ches
chame deuenit plegius legalis per manus sue dextre ostensionem quod
dictus Johannes andersone erit Indempnes pro Andrea gray aliter quam
per viam Juris Et dictus Willelmus Rolland deuenit plegius legalis
quod dictus Andreas erit Indempnes pro dicto Johanne aliter quam per
viam Juris Et dictos partes obligantur hinc inde and conseruandum
dictos suos plegius de huiusmodi fideiussione per manium suarum ostensionum

The said' day the prouest and ballieis assignit friday that next Cumis to William
stile to preiwe the gudis of airschip clamit aving him be cristy prat

Curia Balliuorum burgj de Abirdene tenta in Pretorio
eiusdem vltimo die mensis Julij Anno quo supra et cetera

The said' day Robert crag come souerte be his vphaldin for Williame stile for
ale thingis that cristy prat may opten' one him befor the prouest and Balyeis as
law And' William Wormet come souerte be his land' vphaldin for the said' cristy
for ale thingis that the said' Williame may optene one him as law wile

The said' day the prouest and balyeis chrgit and ordanit cristy prat to deliuer
to Williame stile ale the gudis or airschip grantit be him contenit in ane
writ with sere Dauy liellis hande and Dauy stralochis hand' presentit befor thame
in the Court

The said day It was deliuerit and ordanit be the Counsale that nay mane sale
conduce nothir fre ane vthir mannys boytmane withoute speciale licence of the mastir
with the quhilkis he duellis askit and optenit

The said' day Androw Innes was conuict' be ane suorne assis' for tribulance of
Androw nachtj seriand in the execucioun' of his office Johne Cullane forspekar for the
quhilkis he was in ane Amerciament of the Court et cetera

The said' day the prouest and ballieis assignit friday that next Cumis to William
Stile to preiwe the gudis of airschip aving to him be Cristj Prat vngran
tit quhilkis he wantis pertening to him be deces' of his fadir

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem tercio die mensis Augusti
anno quo supra

The said' day the balyeis assignit friday that next Cumis to Johne frostar' to
preiwe Williame Coupar pait of fiwe Schillingis clamit aving to hom of his
fee

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem Sexto die mensis
augusti anno quo supra

The said day James gourlay come Souerte be his hand' vphaldin to the
prouest that Androw Johnesone botisman to Johne of Cullane sale bringe the said'
Johnez bait fra the nevburghe' to the havin of Abirdene in ale hast alsone
as wynde and wedir' wile serue tharto and cleitht and Inhabitis the hous' quhilkis
he has of the said' Johne in tak in futy and labour' with the said bait
to the profit of the said' Johne of Cullan Ande he sale entir the said' Androw
in the tolbutht of the said' burghe one friday cum xv dais thar' tile vndirlie
the law in ale thingis that the said' Johne has to say to him

The said' day Williame stile one that ane part Ande cristy prat one that vthir part was oblist
and suorne the gret bodelie aithe to stand and abid' at the decret and finale ordinance of
mastir Johne lindesay vicar of colsalmond' Androw lousone chosin for the part of the
said' cristj thomas leslie and Johne Ratre chosin for the said' William anent ale gudis
of airschip clamit and follouit be the said' William barnispart of gudis and vthir wais
pertening to him or may pertene be deces' of Alexander stile his fadir and his modir And'
anent tua merkis clamit be the said' cristy for borrouing of ane Comptor' burd' ij s' g'
his burding for fiwe yeris and ale vthir debatis clamys and contrauersis debatabile
betuix the said' partiis

Curia balliuorum burgi de abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xiiijto
die mensis Augusti anno quo supra

The said' day the prouest and Counsale present for the tyme grauntit licence
and leif to mastir thomas chamer chaplane of our lady altar to pas' in
pilgramage to Sanct Johne of Ameas'
